version_description:
- Re-branding of the app.
- User Enrollment.
- Bug Fixes
- Bug Fixes and Improvements

- Handling no or Intermittent internet connectivity
- Handling certificate revocation, expiry, and deleted devices from kiosks.
- Handling claimed mobile numbers
- Other bug fixes

Now you can register for a basic account without your Emirates ID!
- Enrollment without EID
- Account recovery directly from mobile
- Adding new device to your UAEPASS account
- Performance improvements
- Bug fixes

Newly introduced Features:
- Secure code autofill for OTP messages.
- Home page Alerts.
- Sharing Signed Documents.
- Opening documents to sign directly on the app.

Enhancements:
- Enhanced messaging on upgrade by trusted account.
- Provide the reason for any failed upgrade in order to guide the user to what he needs to do.
- Enhanced loading spinners and messages.
- Using UAEPASS logo spinner along with appropriate loading messages.
- Added masked email/mobile during recovery.
- Allow the user to tell which email or mobile he will be receiving the OTP on.
- Enhanced app startup performance.
- Removed All unnecessary API calls to ensure the shortest amount of time until the home screen is loaded and app is ready to be used.
- UI is smooth and clean during startup without background changes or flashing.

Bug Fixes:
- Fixed SMS rate limiting issue.
- Preventing OTPs from being generated immediately by setting OTP lifespan.
- Fixed DubaiID/Smartpass logo appearing on Personal details page.
- Removing the logos as the were confusing for the users since we no longer have the sign up with option.
- Fixed allowing verified emirates ID to proceed after scanning during account creation.
- Redirect the user to account recovery rather than proceed with account creation.
- Fixed gender and martial status attributes not appearing on the account profile page.
- Fixed trusted account registration failure after updating expired emiratesID on the trusted account providers.

- Performance Enhancements
- Bug Fixes

- Request and view digital copy of official documents from Government and Private sector issuers.
- Digitally store self-sign documents in the application.
- Share official and digitally signed documents with service providers like banks, exchange house, telecom sector etc.
- Enhanced Notifications view for sharing the documents, approaching expiring, or cancellation of official documents.

- You can now easily upgrade to Advanced account if you are a verified DubaiID or SmartPass user
- You can now manage the devices under your account directly from the app
- Reminders to upgrade your account
- Enhanced error messages
- Updated FAQs
- Kiosk locations filter
- Email notification in case new device is added or recovered
- Enhanced action screen after digital signatures
- Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes.

We are always trying to improve your experience.

This update includes:
- Face ID management from the app.
- Arabic language support and management from the app.
- Enhanced account protection through PIN attempts.
- Support page enhancements.
- Enhanced document signature process.
- Bug Fixes

- Enhanced Document view for better user experience
- Enhanced gestures to perform various actions
- Ability to search, archive and unarchive notifications

- Minor UI label fixes.
- Minor Enhancementâ€™s for Document Sharing
- Minor Bug Fixes
- Minor Bug Fixes

- Minor improvements and bug fixes

1. Minor UI optimization and fixes
2. Improved User experience for Data Sharing feature
3. Enhancement in document verification service
4. Minor UI enhancements
5. Security enhancements
6. Bug fixes
- Minor bug fixes
- Bug Fixes

- Minor bug fixes.
- Added pull to refresh.

- Security control changes by renewing device identity issued by one of UAE PASS CA (DESC).
- UI Enhancement for Account page and account upgrade from mobile.
- Introducing "News" feature to publish latest news or information related to UAE PASS and integrated partners.
- Minor bug fixes.

Boosted app performance
General UX enhancements for document sharing
Minor bug fixes
